changes.description: Added 'flex flex-col' to the aside element to enable flexbox column layout. Added 'shrink-0' to the header div to prevent it from shrinking. Wrapped the nav element in a new div with 'flex-1 overflow-y-auto' to create a scrollable container that takes up remaining space while keeping the header fixed at the top.

Added 'flex' to the root container div for proper flexbox layout. Added 'flex-1' to the main element to ensure it takes remaining width. Added 'overflow-x-hidden' to prevent horizontal overflow issues from the main content area.
